title: End game Honer screen does not load for 2-3 minutes after match.
body: I dunno what to really do about this. I have tried reinstalling and the hextech repair tool. The Honer a team mate screen at the end of the match takes a good 2-3 minutes to load up, its just the Honer a team mate screen though, the client doesn't lag anywhere else and its really frustrating having to wait such a long delay when I wanna just jump right back in.

replies.body: Check to see if you have the option in the client settings called "close client during game" checked. If so, uncheck it and let me know if the Honor screen shows up faster.

This worked! Thank you so much for the help. Please accept this poro snax as a token of my gratitude.

http://i.imgur.com/CS36UyK.jpg
